taskBreakdown.Name: Site Preparation
taskBreakdown.Description: Clearing the site, setting up fencing and temporary utilities.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Ensure site is cleared according to plan, with all debris removed.

taskBreakdown.Name: Foundation and Footing
taskBreakdown.Description: Excavation and pouring of concrete for foundation and footing including placement of rebar.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Concrete mix and rebar placement must meet structural engineering specifications.

taskBreakdown.Name: Structural Framing
taskBreakdown.Description: Construction of structural frames using timber, including roof trusses.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Frames and trusses must align with architectural plans and structural integrity requirements.

taskBreakdown.Name: Wall Construction
taskBreakdown.Description: Building internal and external walls using bricks and blocks.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Walls must be level and meet designated wall thickness and height as per plans.

taskBreakdown.Name: Roof Installation
taskBreakdown.Description: Installation of roofing materials and ensuring waterproofing.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Roof must be properly secured and leak-proof.

taskBreakdown.Name: Plumbing Installation
taskBreakdown.Description: Installation of all plumbing systems, including pipes and connections, as well as bathroom and kitchen fixtures.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: All fixtures must be installed correctly and tested for leaks.

taskBreakdown.Name: Electrical Installation
taskBreakdown.Description: Wiring of the entire house, including installation of switches and outlets.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Wiring must comply with electrical safety regulations and all fixtures must be tested.

taskBreakdown.Name: Interior Finishing
taskBreakdown.Description: Applying wall finishes such as paint, wallpaper, tiles in specific rooms as well as ceiling treatments and floor installation.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Finishes must be even and free of defects, colors and materials should match the selections in the design specifications.

taskBreakdown.Name: Final Inspection and Cleanup
taskBreakdown.Description: A thorough inspection of the construction work to ensure everything is up to code followed by a detailed cleaning.
taskBreakdown.Quality Control Requirements: Achieve final approval from building inspector.
